# AVCaption.FontWeight

**Enumeration**

Font weights for a caption.

## Declaration

```swift
enum FontWeight
```

## Font weights

- **AVCaption.FontWeight.unknown**: An unknown font weight.
- **AVCaption.FontWeight.normal**: A normal font weight.
- **AVCaption.FontWeight.bold**: A bold font weight.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Accessing font styles

- **fontStyle(at:)**: Returns the font style and range at the index position.
- **AVCaption.FontStyle**: Font styles for caption text.
- **fontWeight(at:)**: Returns the font weight and range at the index position.
- **decoration(at:)**: Returns the text decoration at the index position.
- **AVCaption.Decoration**: Text decorations for caption text.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: Returns the font style and range at the index position.
